features: 【Arm & Leg Mini Exercise Bike】AGM pedal exerciser can be used for arms and legs exercises to improve muscle strength, joint range of motion and coordination. You can use it on table top as an arm exerciser or placed on the floor to your legs exerciser while sitting.
【Compact & Portable Design】With 12.6' height, this portable pedal foot cycle exerciser machine can be easily fitted under desk or similar space, perfect for exercising in office or at home!

【Safe & Non-Slip】Comfortable non-slip foot pedal exerciser bike pedals straps keep your feet fixed and ensure the stability. The adjustable foot straps are flexible to accommodate users of different sizes to meet different requirements.
【Adjustable Workout Intensity】Easily adjust the resistance level with the tension knob to meet your needs. This mini exercise bike is a great choice for beginners and perfect for elderly exercise.
【Multifunctional LCD Display】AGM under desk bike pedal exerciser attaches LCD screen display, data like time, speed, distance and calories burned are easily to get while using.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AGM Comfact Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser Under Desk Bike is a stable, quiet, minutes-to-install mini exercise bike that is perfect for sedentary office workers to improve circulation and exercise arms and legs, for gym-goers to warm up and build strength, and for seniors to rehabilitate. With life’s busy schedule, the Mini Exercise Bike Pedal Exerciser ensures you can squeeze in a workout that fits you. Just an under desk bike pedal exerciser, placed under the desk to ride, to achieve the freedom to exercise at any time.

LCD Display Under desk bike comes with LCD display shows Time, Distance, Count, T-Count, Calories, 5 values clearly, it automatically calculate a number of laps, so exercise becomes traceable! Adjust the Resistance The tension knob can be used to increase resistance clockwise and decrease resistance counterclockwise according to training goals, meeting the exercise needs of warm-ups, rehabilitation, exercise novices, sedentary office workers and the elderly. Wider + Thickened Non-Slip Pedal Sturdy pedal exerciser non-slip pedal for safety and efficiency! The foot cover design increases the friction between the foot and the pedal, not easy to fall off. Durable Round Belt-Driver System The internally lubricated belt-driver system provides a smoother, quieter ride than a chain drive. Polished exterior black frame isolates from internal parts while riding for safety.

Arm Exerciser Activate the arms, chest and back flab, exercise the flabby arms, biceps, back fat, and prevent the accumulation of flab. Suitable for people who usually do not exercise often, can exercise to the most easily ignored parts of the usual. Leg Exerciser When exercising the legs, pay attention to tighten the core, smooth riding mini exercise bike, can effectively exercise legs, especially suitable for sedentary people, promote blood circulation, reduce the risk of sedentary. Compact Design Under desk bike mini exercise bike can be used whilst watching TV or reading. The compact design pedal exerciser can be easily stored when not in use. Weight: 9.3 lb Size: 16.1*12.5*7..4 inch Home Mini Desk Exercise Bike This home mini exercise bike, so you do not need to go to the gym, yoga studio, to be able to exercise anywhere, anytime. Suitable for the elderly, sedentary, fitness needs of the population, both men and women.

Package: Main Bady Pedal Exerciser: 1 Right & Left Pedal: 1 Front & Rear Stabilizer: 1 Hex Bolt M6 & Washer: 4 Small L-Wrench: 1 Non-slip Mat & and Straps: 1 Comes with all accessories for easy installation in minutes. Features: Leg & Arm WorkoutHome & Office ExerciserExtra Thick Pedals for All FeetWith Tension Knob to Adjust Pedal ResistanceHeavy Duty Frame Reduces Shaky motionCompact Design Requires Little Space Still feeling bad about buying exercise equipment but letting it sit unused without exercise? The mini exercise bike allows you to realize the idea that sitting can also be fitness, to be able to exercise at any time and anywhere is the greatest use of exercise equipment. This under desk bike pedal exerciser to help you achieve arm and leg exercise, but also the perfect gift for family and friends, elderly!

Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser Folding Exercise Bike Folding Mini Exercise Bike Resistance Bands Set (12pcs) Resistance Loop Exercise Bands Resistance Loop Exercise Bands Features Upgraded Magnetic Resistance Exercise Bike Upgraded Big Exercise Bike Folding Pedal Exerciser Shape Your Body Resistance Loop Exercise Bands Resistance Loop Exercise Bands Users Men & Women Men & Women Men & Women Men & Women Men & Women Men & Women Occasion Gym, Home,Office Gym, Home,Office Gym, Home, Outdoor Gym, Home, Outdoor Gym, Home, Outdoor Gym, Home, Outdoor Capacity 1 Pack 1 Pack 1 Pack 12 Pack 5 Pack 5 Pack Resistance Knob 1-8 Levels 1-8 Levels 0-1 Knob 10-100lbs bands 5-40LBS bands 5-40LBS bands Weight 19LBS 45LBS 6LBS - - -

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I have this in my office that I share with 2 other people. My desk is small so I have to use it next to my desk. It is quiet and doesn't bother them. I tend to do it during break times. It was easy to put together. I did it buy myself in 15 minutes or less. I'm buying a second one for my house. It definitely helps with my stiff knees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This thing is sweet, it should be exactly what you expect. Anyone complaining about this $45 mini bike should go get a pelaton lol, oh wait! They probably can’t afford one🤪 I was on tiktok scrolling as one does while also peddling and trying to tune out the zoom call I was on and yeah this thing is worth it, my legs are definitely feelin it. You get what you pay for. If you’re expecting more than what you paid for that’s on you not the seller 😗 I’ll definitely lube the pedals a bit because they started squeaking and hopefully that will help maintain it and it won’t break as fast (I read you should do that) if you don’t read and maintain - your fault haha 😆 if you’re on a budget and want to get a little more cardio than you would without it, just get it.I almost gave it 4 stars because of the squeaking after the first use but then I was like wait… this thing was super cheap what did I expect??It’s light weight like people say but you can 100% get a full motion whoever wrote that comment about their whole family not getting full motion were probably trying to ride it like a real bike or something lmaoIt’s not super sturdy but you’ll figure out where to put it with some time and bloody patience.The display screen is chill, I probably won’t use it though, I don’t think I’m going to be tracking my overall fitness health via this mini bike lol again, this thing is a great piece for extra cardio and movement, it’s not a mountain bike.The knob resistance doesn’t get super tight which at first I was bummed about but then when I started going, after 5 minutes I had to turn it down a little! So I mean until I can fully send it on full resistance I’ll keep that to myself haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So easy to put together and to use. I keep it next to the couch and whenever I am watching TV I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product used or returned....
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to get this. I have to have physical therapy; because I'm going to have to have a benign tumor removed from my left leg. So I'm keeping my knees agile while I'm waiting.When I opened the box, the first thing that I noticed was the bolts were just kind of floating loose around the box. In some ways the items looked like some of the parts were new, and some were either returned, or used. No instructions were included.I know on the video it shows where you have to attach the rubber ends to the feet, and they were already on. Also... The screws had been screwed back in to the feet. So I had a bunch of extra bolts that were not necessary.My guess is that the manufacturer just left the screws inside the feet, and then just threw another bag in there. However, the bag was ripped...so they kind of went everywhere. The base of the bike did not have any new plastic on it at, all as well.Once I got it assembled, like other reviewers...it kind of had a jerking movement when you would pedaled it. Every time you went around once, it would jerk. So I adjusted the resistance. Once I did that, it started to pedal smoother. I also adjusted where my feet were on the pedals, and I finally got it to a point where I could go forward, and backwards pretty smoothly. The backwards motion has a little bit of a roughness to it. But the forward's okay.I also found that I really do have to pay attention where I angled your feet when I peddled; because even with small feet like mine, I could feel my heel every now and then...touch the bottom of the floor.I do feel that I finally got it to a point where it's usable. But I personally think I deserve a discount; since they sent me either a returned product, or a used one. Right now it's working okay.It does come with a resistance mat. But that mat is not that strong. I have no carpet on any of my floors, whatsoever. So even when I pedal, I will still get some movement. But it's not as bad, then if it was just sitting on the floor without the little mat. I'm thinking about buying a better, sturdier mat; then what it came with...so it can have more resistance from skidding.I don't think it's worth the price for what I got. Especially since it was used, or returned. I think it's probably worth more in the $35 range. But definitely not the $50.Of course.... The second day I used the bike, I did hear a little bit of squeaking noice. So it definitely isn't made real sturdy. But I think I'm having a little bit better results than some of the other reviewers. I am a little bit disappointed that I didn't get a brand new one. But since I've been able to adjust everything where I have somewhat of a smooth pedal motion, I'm going to see how it works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made and sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to get out and put away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wheely Disappointed: A Bumpy Ride on the Under-the-Desk Bike
reviews.reviewText: As someone who values staying active while working, I was excited to give the under-the-desk bike a spin. However, my experience was far from smooth sailing - more like a rocky road, to be exact! The pedaling motion felt more jolting than a pothole-ridden street, leaving me wobbling at my workstation. I tried adjusting the resistance, but it seemed determined to throw me off course. Needless to say, this bike left me feeling deflated rather than invigorated. I'll have to pump the brakes on recommending this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband uses his once or twice a day, for 20 minutes. He's trying to keep his legs strengthened. He's on oxygen, so walking and this is keeping him mobile and stronger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buns of steel!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my wife so she could use it at work. Turns out all the office ladies love it! They fight over who gets to use it! Not only is it useful, it's contagious! Make time pass by faster at your desk and get one of these bad boys!
Que puedo hacer ejercicio en casa

reviews.reviewTitle: It was good but no good for my wife
reviews.reviewText: It was a nice little machine but my wife didn’t have the strength in her legs to peddle with the diease she has.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for arms and legs exercises, portable and well made
reviews.reviewText: This product is perfect for pre warm up to a run, I also just put it on my table and use it for arm exercises
BUEN PRECIO Y MATERIAL, LLEGO EXCELENTE, GRACIAS.
Confusing to set up. Tools and materials that were not needed. Pedaling is not smooth, hard to develop a rhythm. Needs to be anchored or it moves.
